title: Sea and Rain
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Antonio Frasconi [1919-2013]; Weyhe Gallery, New York, NY, 1957; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1957 until May 11, 1965 [1]; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, May 1965.

Notes:
[1]. See copy of letter by Mrs. Beal to Carnegie Institute, dated December 12, 1964. She gives the source as the Weyhe Gallery and a valuation of $90, which was likely the purchase price.

creator.birth_place: Buenos Aires (Ciudad Aut√≥noma de Buenos Aires, Argentina)
